channel.title: Rune-Village " The best Old-School Pking Server "
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1zbqb2t.jpg[/img]
[u][b][size=18pt]Welcome to Rune-Village's Project thread![/size][/b][/u]
[b]If you would like to know latest news, updates and pictures you can see them at: Www.Rune-Village.Enjin.Com[/b]
[u][b]Projects what is now completed:[/b][/u] The perfect 2005-2008 PvM + PvP. Most of the weapons have correct special bonuses, + Item bonuses. (Like Brine Sabre). Clanchat, with lootshare feature. Superfast old item switching. (Good for hybridding). Dragonfire shield real animation + GFX. Pk points shop, which is really legit! Report a player real way! And of course more, it's really hard to remember all of em and write them. Skills completed: Woodcutting Fishing Fletching Firemaking Cooking Agility Mining Smithing Runecrafting Crafting Farming Herblore.
Coming updates: Dwarf's Multicannon. Slayer helmet effects (100%), with a slayerpoints store. More "oldskool" looking! Flax picking for money! Skilling for money. Vengeance other player Energy Transfer Training places Bosses Spawns Maybe some minigames Mini-Quests.
[b]We will post more information soon.[/b]
[b]Some pictures of the server (You can see more at our websites without registering):[/b] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2mqvyfp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2euo1o5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/ih40e8.jpg[/img] [b]More pictures are coming soon.
To see a lot more pictures you can see without registering at: http://rune-village.enjin.com/gallery Serverbase is Project Insanity, which was cleaned.[/b]

item.title: Rune-Village " The best Old-School Pking Server "
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Village Rune-Village
item.description:
@Rune-Village wrote:

1zbqb2t.jpg1050×181

[size=18pt]Welcome to Rune-Village’s Project thread![/size]

If you would like to know latest news, updates and pictures you can see them at:
Www.Rune-Village.Enjin.Com

Projects what is now completed:
The perfect 2005-2008 PvM + PvP.
Most of the weapons have correct special bonuses, + Item bonuses. (Like Brine Sabre).
Clanchat, with lootshare feature.
Superfast old item switching. (Good for hybridding).
Dragonfire shield real animation + GFX.
Pk points shop, which is really legit!
Report a player real way!
And of course more, it’s really hard to remember all of em and write them.
Skills completed:
Woodcutting
Fishing
Fletching
Firemaking
Cooking
Agility
Mining
Smithing
Runecrafting
Crafting
Farming
Herblore.

Coming updates:
Dwarf’s Multicannon.
Slayer helmet effects (100%), with a slayerpoints store.
More “oldskool” looking!
Flax picking for money!
Skilling for money.
Vengeance other player
Energy Transfer
Training places
Bosses
Spawns
Maybe some minigames
Mini-Quests.

We will post more information soon.

Some pictures of the server (You can see more at our websites without registering):

2mqvyfp.jpg764×502



[b]More pictures are coming soon.

To see a lot more pictures you can see without registering at: http://rune-village.enjin.com/gallery
Serverbase is Project Insanity, which was cleaned.[/b]
